Due to my misfortune and situation I'm selling things to make it to AX this year. Since ebay isn't working for me and I'm getting too many fees for unsold items. Ebay isn't great as it used to be. :/ please look for a bit, if something intrests you leave a comment! Though you have to pay ASAP if you intend to get something. Shipping/handling will add a few more bucks to the cost. Depends where you live but I promise it shouldn't be more than 3 or 4 bucks for some items. Let people know if you think someone could be intrested! :3 ♥ Arashi Calendar. It's a big book with a ring spine. It's a really wonderful calendar if you're a big fan of Arashi, I highly reccomend this. It also comes with a mouse pad/strap that has Arashi written on it. The strap is to hold up the calendar up. price is $40 front mousepad closer look at the strap/mouse pad glossy pages another one Hold for Suikoden Tatics PS2 I'm currently not playing this, and I'm not intrested in keeping it since I'm currently playing V at the moment. I only played it three times. It's in perfect condition. X3;; For playstation 2 It also comes with a music CD that has arrangements from other Suikoden songs. price: $25 game here Ouran Host club B2 poster. This poster is only in Animedia magazine. You can't get it anywhere else. It's a lovely poster of all of them, and Haruhi has long hair o_O? price is: $12 picture here One piece Laboon plush Laboon is that awsome whale they meet at the grand line. ;~; his story breaks my heart. I have a plush here of Laboon. It's still attached to the "background art" It's in mint condition. price: $20 I actually paid a lot for Laboon since it was the last one at the store. X3; Laboon Nobu Nana plush I think when I bought Shin, I accidently mistook Nobu for Shin for some reason. I was retarded.. ahaha so I ended up with a Nobu with no home. price: $12 Nobu is so lonely sold to Sasu. Ichigo DX plush I think when they first released the Ichigo/Kon plushies only I bought Ichigo. The tag is still on him and he's not in horrible condition. You can see my picture price: $20 Ichigyo hold for Beer chan plush X3 I don't remember when I bought beer-chan. There's not much merchendise on him anymore as they used to have it. Beer-chan is awsome. This plush is just too cute~ price: $15 beer-chan Final Fantasy Online reserve poster ahaha.. marketing at work gets thrown away a lot, Though it's hard to convince your boss to let you have some things. X3;; This is a rare item that no one has, and no one can get. Price: $15 I saw it on ebay once for 40, I believe that's retarded. FFOnline poster Kingdom Hearts II store banner These look great on the wall, :3 They have small holes punched into them so you can just hang it on your wall easily. :3 price: $12 KHII banner hold for Sora KHII store banner poster :3 an almost body shot of Sora. X3;; pictures speaks for itself. price:$ 10 Sora banner holding for Tales of Phantasia box display When the GBA release came out this was in the corner of our store. This is a pretty big box. X3;; I love Tales of Phantasia but.. I really have no room for it. X3 *lol* price: $15 ToP box hold for Loveless keychain/coin purse set I could sell these items seperatly or together. Whichever you want X3 never opened and brand new. price: $20 for both or $10 each loveless set keychain on hold for Tsu coin purse still open. Naruto promo poster This poster is pretty rare, you don't usually get game posters lately. X3;; Price: $12 I've included the shipping price for this poster. Naruto promo poster One piece promo poster Another game promo poster. Really rare, hard to find. Also included shipping in the price for this one as well. price: $12 one piece Dynasty Warriors 4 artbook All in Japanese, an awsome artbook, if you're a fan of Dynasty warriors this is your artbook. price: $15 Dynasty warriors 4 hold for DBSK CD single set singles: The way u are, and someone to love. One Korean, one Japanese. :3 These are really good singles. Not bad at all. These are in great condition, I only listened to it three times total.price: $20 DBSKhold for Fate Stay Night fan This fan will cool you off this summer with Sakura and Saber, I think you would get hotter. X3;; price: $10 Sakura Saber FMA pencil case hold your pencils in this shiny tin pencil case~ :3 You can't lose with that. price: $8 pretty case Gundam Seed Destiny magazine/Fan+stickers Animage has really great posters in it. X3 This one came along with a fan for it's furoku. I'll also throw in Gundam Seed stickers that came from another magazine. X3;; price: $15 GSeedDestiny Gundam Seed Destiny poster It's a fairly large poster. :3 Picture speaks for itself. Price: $5 GSeeD Chobits vol. 1 DVD I don't know why I got this, it has four episodes and it's Chobits. X3;;Price: $5 chobits for DVD spirited away DVD This isn't my fave Miyazaki movie. I think I watched it too late. It's a two disc DVD, just like all his other movies. :3 It's either you like it or you don't. It isn't my cup of tea.price: $20 spirited away DVD Poporo/Potato magazines If you like JE/Johnny's entertainment, these are your magazines. Esp. Poporo, they have a bunch of them all wet/half nakid. X3;; Mostly of NewS, KATTUN, Kanjani8 and more. X3;; comes with a lot of posters as well. I can sell two together or seperatly. Whichever you want. price: for Poporo~$20 for Potato~$15 for both $30 magazines Kingdom Hearts II keychains/straps I bought a whole box of these at one point. I didn't open most of them but I have four left. Comes with a cute keychain of Sora, Mickey, Donald, Goofy, or all three. It looks like the CoMemories cards. I'm selling all four as a whole. price: $10 KHII goods hold for both and Ichigo keychain I bought this, and I didn't know what to do with it. I have too many keychains. It looks cool. X3;; price: $15 Ichigo Rock Lee pillow This pillow is all magical but I never opened it. X3;; it's in mint condition and never opened. Perfect for the Rock Lee fanatic in you. It also comes with that wristband too. price: $15 front back sold. US Shounen Jumps/EGM magazines I grab a bunch of stuff at work. These are one of these things. The EGM's have random KHII posters. That were only in EGM. X3;; The shounen jumps.. uh I dunno I read them at work, one of them has D.gray-man. price: Shounen jumps: $5 each, $8 for both. EGM- same. magazines. Rozen Maiden clear file I love Rozen Maiden to death and the art is just so beautiful. X3;; It's nice to hang on the wall too. price: $6 front back Trapnest cellphone sticker This is a sticker where you can stick it all over your phone. You can use it for something else too, doesen't have to be a phone. It can be a large sticker. It has Trapnest. :3 price: $5 Trapnest sticker Prince of Tennis pins It was hard to collect these but I got them all. I will only sell them as a set. price: $40 pins

Japantown needs some savin! >:O sign if you can~ :3 ♥ 

<lj-cut text=";A;">
If you have been watching or reading the news, there is word going around that 3/4 of San Francisco's Japantown is now up for sale.

(refer to 2/9/06 front page of the SF Examiner).

The Kintesu of America Corporation's property and the AMC Kabuki Theatre is currently up for sale and from what they own, that equals to 3/4 of all Japantown's property. Many fear that a sale of these properties to people without the intention of preserving 'Nihonmachi' will ultimately destroy it.

Currently, there are three Japantowns in the nation, with the other two in San Jose and Los Angeles.

(<lj user="soletta"> note: The San Francisco Japan Town is the best one out of the three. This is also relevant to my work because of the Asian Film Festival. The AMC Kabuki Theatre is where we have lots of the screenings.)

Being that I have been raised in this neighborhood and many others consider this to be "home" I have established a website that goes to an online petition to ask the City of San Francisco, Kintesu, and AMC theatres to demand that they don't make our neighborhood disappear from the earth.

Let's all remember that as a community, we should always try to preserve our heritage and support others that are struggling. I know that many of you have been to J-Town and/or attended the Cherry Blossom Festival at one point in your lives (especially when I announced the Cherry Blossom Festival in my Ating Tao class).

Please, I ask of you to sign this petition. The website is so easy! It is located at:
http://www.SaveJapantown.com and links directly to "Petition Online."

If you know anyone else whom may be interested in signing this petition at SaveJapantown.com, please tell them. The more signatures, the better response!



I know petitions aren't the way to go, but it's a start. I also want to post this on cosplay.com being that there are a number of events at Japan Town that do affect conventions. I'm afraid it's going to be locked. Even though I've mentioned that this goes beyond Japanese pop culture, it would help to gather more support than just posting this on my livejournal.

If you have time at Japantown tommorrow come by and watch USAMusume dance/sing we will be performing around 3~ ♥ so if you can do that, that would totally make my day. 

Now I go sing and reherse for tommorrowies.

THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT. Now I KNOW that the Governor will probably veto the bill no matter what, but it is STILL IMPORTANT that our voices get heard on the matter. PLEASE EVERYONE WHO HAS EVER CLAIMED TO GIVE ANY SORT OF FLYING FUCK ABOUT CIVIL RIGHTS, CALL THIS NUMBER. Reposted from MDYaoi's Y!Gallery journal: California Gov. Schwarzenegger's office is accepting calls from anywhere regarding their marriage equality bill. It passed both houses of their legislature, but needs the Governer's approval. It's all automated, so you don't have to talk to anyone. Follow these directions: 1. Call the Governor: 916-445-2841 (This number is listed at www.governor.ca.gov) 2. Push: 2 (voice your opinion on legislation) 3. Push: 1 (gender-neutral marriage bill - Senate Bill 849) 4. And push: 1 to support marriage equality PLEASE, IF YOU EVER REPOSTED ANYTHING IN YOUR JOURNAL, REPOST THIS.

Oh yeah like everyone says the Naruto dub is bad, but I thought it was so funny. They had the most suggestive dialogue ever.

The house of representitives of California passed the bill today legalizing same sex marriage! It is now being sent to the state senate, and the Goveneor has announced that he will support what ever the state senate will decide. Let's all keep our fingers crossed! Various links for more info:: LA Times: http://www.latimes.com/news/local/politics/cal/la-me-gaymarriage7sep07,1,5420306.story?coll=la-news-politics-california MTV.com: http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1509018/20050907/index.jhtml?headlines=true Washington Post: http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2005/09/07/AR2005090700405.html San Francisco Chronicle: http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/n/a/2005/09/06/state/n210908D31.DTL :3 I hope it gets passed~! *o*
